RMD file for Group 1 Analysis

```{r}

#| label: role 1

pacman::p_load(tidyverse,
               dplyr,
               ggplot2)
            
gtd <- read.csv("globalterrorismdb_0718dist.csv")
head(gtd)

gtd_filter <- gtd |>
  filter(!is.na(iyear))
gtd_filter

attacks_per_year <- gtd_filter |>
  group_by(iyear) |>
  summarise(total_attacks = n())
attacks_per_year

```
